steps.title: Open your iPhone's App Store.
steps.content: Open your iPhone's App Store. Tap the App Store app icon, which resembles a white "A" on a light-blue background.

steps.title: Tap Search.
steps.content: Tap Search . It's a tab in the bottom-right corner of the App Store screen.

steps.title: Tap the "App Store" text box.
steps.content: Tap the "App Store" text box. This is at the top of the screen. Your iPhone's on-screen keyboard will appear.

steps.title: Search for Facebook.
steps.content: Search for Facebook. Type in facebook , then tap Search in the bottom-right corner of the keyboard.

steps.title: Tap GET.
steps.content: Tap GET . It's to the right of the Facebook logo. If you've previously downloaded Facebook, you'll tap the cloud icon here instead.

steps.title: Enter your Touch ID or Apple ID password when prompted.
steps.content: Enter your Touch ID or Apple ID password when prompted. Either scan your Touch ID fingerprint or type in your Apple ID password to prompt Facebook to begin installing. iPhone X users can simply look at the iPhone's screen to use the Face ID feature. You can open Facebook as soon as it finishes installing by tapping OPEN in the App Store (or by tapping the Facebook app icon on one of the Home Screens).

steps.title: Open your Android's Play Store.
steps.content: Open your Android's Play Store. Tap the Play Store app icon, which resembles a multicolored triangle on a white background.

steps.title: Tap the search bar.
steps.content: Tap the search bar. It's at the top of the Play Store page. Your Android's on-screen keyboard will appear.

steps.title: Search for Facebook.
steps.content: Search for Facebook. Type facebook into the search bar. A drop-down menu with related results will appear.

steps.title: Tap Facebook.
steps.content: Tap Facebook . It's in the drop-down menu. Doing so opens the Facebook app page.

steps.title: Tap INSTALL.
steps.content: Tap INSTALL . This is at the top of the page.

steps.title: Tap ACCEPT if prompted.
steps.content: Tap ACCEPT if prompted. Facebook will begin installing onto your Android. You can open Facebook as soon as it finishes installing by tapping OPEN in the Play Store (or by tapping the Facebook app icon in the App Drawer).
